  • Method Details

    • Move

      public void Move​(Player player, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY) throws InvalidCommandException, InvalidMoveActionException
      Handle a move command during playing phase
      Specified by:
      Move in interface GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player that invokes this call
      fromX - the starting X coordinate on the board
      fromY - the starting Y coordinate on the board
      toX - the destination X coordinate on the board
      toY - the destination Y coordinate on the board
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if the starting or destination positions are invalid
      InvalidMoveActionException - if the move is invalid based on the player's god modifiers

    • Build

      public void Build​(Player player, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY, int lvl) throws InvalidCommandException, InvalidBuildActionException
      Handle a build command during playing phase
      Specified by:
      Build in interface GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player that invokes this call
      fromX - the starting X coordinate on the board
      fromY - the starting Y coordinate on the board
      toX - the destination X coordinate on the board
      toY - the destination Y coordinate on the board
      lvl - the block to build, usually should be either corresponding to the current height or a dome
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if the starting or destination positions are invalid
      InvalidBuildActionException - if the build is invalid based on the player's god modifiers

    • EndTurn

      public void EndTurn​(Player previousPlayer, Player newPlayer, boolean lose) throws InvalidCommandException
      Handle turn change
      Specified by:
      EndTurn in interface GameState
      Parameters:
      previousPlayer - the player ending its turn
      newPlayer - the player beginning its turn
      lose - has the previous player lost
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if the previous player has not completed his mandatory actions (based on god modifiers)

    • checkLose

      public boolean checkLose​(Player player)
      Check if the player should lose the game
      Specified by:
      checkLose in interface GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Returns:
      true if the player should lose now

    • currentlyPlaying

      public boolean currentlyPlaying()
      Is this state past the setup state (god selection, worker placing, etc.)
      Specified by:
      currentlyPlaying in interface GameState
      Returns:
